document.full_text: spain's ability to meet deficit reduction targets was thrown into doubt on monday after voters angry about austerity and the eu's highest unemployment rate gave the ruling socialists a fierce drubbing in local elections.
document.title: spanish socialists hammered in local elections
lines_and_colors: spain's ability to meet deficit reduction targets was thrown into doubt on monday after voters angry about austerity and the eu's highest unemployment rate gave the ruling socialists a fierce drubbing in local elections.
